page.title: 02Schools in the Area
page.content: In our area there are five primary schools attended by 1,313 pupils in total. Meanwood is the largest with 427 pupils and Whittaker Moss is the smallest with 160 pupils. There is one middle school, Shawfield. From Shawfield pupils transfer to upper schools in other areas, the majority going to Oulder Hill two and a half miles away. Shawfield Norden Community Middle School opened in 1972.Currently there are 424 pupils aged between 10 and 13. There are three years with five classes in first and second year, six classes in third year. The timetable covers a wide range of subjects and activities.
